gym_lock.scenarios.scenario module¶

Outlines the structure and common functionality across scenarios

class gym_lock.scenarios.scenario.Scenario(use_physics=True)¶

Bases: object

Parent class for scenarios. Outline the structure and common functionality across scenarios. Manage the specific scenario currently in use. Encodes logic and solutions into the environment.

add_door_transitions()¶

Add latent FSM transitions for locking and unlocking door.

Returns:Nothing
add_no_ops(lock, pushed, pulled)¶

Add transitions to self.fsmm from state back to same state when performing action that already matches the state.

Parameters:
  • lock – lock name
  • pushed – pushed states
  • pulled – pulled states
Returns:

Nothing
add_nothing_transition()¶

Add transitions for each state in both FSMs for the nothing action to take state back to same state.

Returns:Nothing
execute_action(action)¶

Run FSM action (push/pull).

Parameters:action – action to execute
Returns:Nothing
execute_pull(obj_name)¶

Execute a pull action.

Parameters:obj_name – object to pull
Returns:Nothing
execute_push(obj_name)¶

Execute a push action.

Parameters:obj_name – object to push
Returns:Nothing
generate_complement_states(lock, pushed, pulled)¶

Give the complement pushed and pulled states for given lock, pushed states, and pulled states.

Parameters:
  • lock – lock name
  • pushed – pushed states for which complement will be generated
  • pulled – pulled states for which complement will be generated
Returns:

two lists: first = all pulled states of lock not in pulled, second = all pushed states of lock not in pushed
get_obj_state()¶

Get state of all levers and the door.

Returns:dictionary of lever/door to state.
get_state()¶

Get state of levers and door, and the fsm state.

Returns:dictionary with keys OBJ_STATES, _FSM_STATE.
init_scenario_env(world_def=None)¶

Initialize the Box2D environment.

Parameters:world_def – world_def to use for physics
Returns:Nothing
push_door()¶

Hack to represent actually pulling the door. Not included in any transition.

Returns:Nothing
reset()¶

Reset the FSM to the initial state for both FSMs.

Returns:Nothing
set_lever_configs(lever_configs)¶

Set self.lever_configs and self.levers. Give each inactive lever a unique name.

Parameters:lever_configs –
Returns:Nothing
update_latent()¶

Logic to transition in the latent state space based on the observable state space, if needed.

Returns:Nothing
update_observable()¶

Update observable fsm based on some change in the observable fsm, if needed.

Returns:
update_state_machine(action=None)¶

Update the finite state machines according to object status in the Box2D environment.

Parameters:action – Action to be executed if not using physics, otherwise will only execute if pushing door.
Returns:Nothing
